about: I am a product designer, born in Criciúma, SC, specialist in design systems and author of the book Design System beyond the layout. I currently work at Locaweb as a Senior Product Designer, helping to build the Locaweb Design System and promoting the design culture within the company.
locaweb-title: Restructuring the tokens of Locaweb Design System
locaweb-description: Locaweb Design System is LWSA's multibranding design system.
letsui-description: Let’s UI is a complete, open-source multibranding design system, created to make interfaces fully fluid.
letsui-title: Let's UI: a multibranding design system with a focus on fluidity
book-description: This book covers everything from initial planning, style and token definition, to components, microinteractions, and documentation, showing how multidisciplinary teams can work efficiently.
